main.name: Andrew Lee
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use React and Javascript to develop web pages
main.bio: Hello! I'm a full Stack Web Developer with a background in Music Studies. I recently earned a certificate in Full Stack Development from UCLA Extension with a strong grasp of CSS, Javascript, React.js, and Responsive Web Design. With a background in music, Iâ€™m known for my creativity, adaptability, resilience, and collaboration skills. I am excited to incorporate my skill set in Web Development by facing programming challenges with a fresh perspective and creative mindset. I'm always looking to work on a team of like-minded individuals that have a passion for enhancing web experience.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: University of California, Los Angeles Extension
education.description: Studied HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Java, Node.js, React.js, Heroku, User Auth., MongoDB, MySQL. Received Certificate of completion and completed various projects showcasing my skill in these topics.
Studied Musicology with a focus on music theory and performance. Gained a full humanities education and took advantage of Python programming classes.

work.title: Freelance React.js Developer
work.description: Worked with a team of three graphic designers to create a car configurator app for Super Mini Coopers using React.js. Utilized the MERN Stack to create a visually stunning UI and UX experience and a clean and organized server.

work.title: Solar Ambassador
work.description: Led crowdfunding campaign to raise enough money to cover costs of solar panels. Implemented marketing strategies including press releases, social media posts, and blogging. Managed all social media and blogging activities.

projects.title: NPR Music News Scraper
projects.category: A web scraper that scrapes music news from NPR.com. Users can save articles and write notes using MongoDB.

projects.title: Burger App!
projects.category: First app I created using Handlebars and MySQL

projects.title: Essy Essentials
projects.category: (MVP Only) Covid Essentials Shop build with Handlebars and MySQL. Utilizes Stripe API for payment processes.

projects.title: Google Books Search
projects.category: A React.js app that uses Google Books API to search for books. Users can then save them to a mongoDB database
